title: I am Bread-CODEX
description:
C O D E X
P R E S E N T S

I am Bread (c) Bossa Studios

Release Date :  04/2015              Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                    Genre      : Action

Michael Jones, Rooster Teeth - I am Bread is a fantastic game. Such
a cool look and fun gameplay. Kotaku - "The most  surprising  thing
about I Am Bread is just how much of an actual 'game' it  is"  Nerd
3 - "Is it worth the money? Yes, very much so. It's an actual game,
not YouTuber bait." Youve seen a slice of the game.  NOW  PLAY  THE
WHOLE  LOAF!  From  the  creators  of Surgeon  Simulator  comes  an
adventure with a hero like no other!
For more infos go to : http://store.steampowered.com/app/327890/

- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
- Play

General Notes:
- Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online ..
- If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead
